description.value:
Trigger A living creature comes within 30 feet of the haunt

Effect The haunt wails, cursing the living for allowing the Puddles residents to wallow in misery while Absalom's elites prosper. Each living creature within 90 feet must attempt a @Check[will|dc:21] save. The haunt then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The creature is temporarily immune to this bloodthirsty apparition's routine for 1 minute.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature shares the apparition's uncontrolled rage against the living. It makes a Strike against itself and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}.

details.description: Deceased Puddles residents lash out at living creatures.
details.disable: @Check[religion|dc:15] (trained) three times to banish the apparitions with prayers, or @Check[occultism|dc:18] (trained) once to commune with the spirits and convince them to pass on

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #6-04: An Enkindled Carnival

details.reset: The haunt re-forms after 1 hour. The haunt becomes disabled and doesn't reform 1 minute after the Puddles phantom is slain.
details.routine: (1 action) The haunt's screams send biting supernatural rain around the area, dealing @Damage[(2d6+2)[piercing]] damage to all living creatures within 90 feet (@Check[reflex|dc:18|basic] save). Creatures who fail the save are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] by a red haze for 1 round.
